name: Bundesgeschäftsstelle Landesbausparkassen im Deutschen Sparkassen und Giroverband e. V.
goal: Bundesgeschäftsstelle Landesbausparkassen represents the interests of the public German Bausparkassen vis à vis political bodies, supervisory authorities and the general public.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Single market
euInitiatives: consumer credit. mortgage credit, Money laundering, banking supervision, consumer protection
